name: Terminal Assassin
description:
A textual world of assassination.

Features:

  • Text only graphics
  • Real-time assassination & stealth gameplay
  • Career mode
  • Mission Editor

IMPORTANT:

Install the TTF font you find in the "fonts" directory and make sure your terminal is using it when starting the game.

Windows Terminal is recommended for Windows.

iterm2 is recommended for MacOS.

Please refer to the readme.txt included in the release or the roguebasin page of the game for further information.
